text: Luigi Dino Felisetti (23 September 1919 â€“ 20 October 2021) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Italian Socialist Party. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1972 to 1987. Felisetti was born in Modena, Italy. Felisetti died on 20 October 2021 in Reggio Emilia, Italy at the age of 102. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Politicians from Emilia-Romagna Category:Italian centenarians
title: Dino Felisetti
